text:
Aditya Gupta Synchro,
Tera text aaya tha, tujhe synchro ka puchna tha aur as it turns out, mai khud nhi bana uske baad bwahaha ğŸ˜†. Vo Riya aaj bhi friend hai, ek aur baar call gya use to is baar pakka apan ko pel dega uska bhai. Then Junoon Synchro karane se better feel shayad hi life me kuch chand jagah milegi. Hamari wali pe aa jao to, virtual festival ka first thought wali meeting jab bas Tomorrowland hi tha mkc aage, 12-7 ka group (BSDK!) (ab ek aur baar nhi suna rha mai vo story) aur tere saath wo last ke do mahine pehle wali call. Antaragni ke liye jaan bhi mtlb Head Marketing, Aditya Gupta. â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Abe mc merko bht saare kisse yaad aa rhe hain ekdum flood hoke. Ek most noteworthy: Kairos Screen naam dalwane me vote ke liye thanks xD crazy shit lmaooo ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£

author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: I loved collecting fines, but I loved vo meme more. I also learnt the first proper usage of gifs in our chat. Book Club ki memories me you will always shine so bright, aur uske bahar teri Dosti bhi â¤ï¸
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Known you first year se. You have almost remained the same. Jovial, kind aur cheerful, I can totally see why Avani admires you so much. Bundles of shared moments, Anshikaaa tu hai super awesome. Loved teri vo wali line, kuch idea aa rha hai dimag me? Badhiya. Chalo krte hain! â¤ï¸
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text:
Fellow PwC! Har baar tu bol deti hai is baar mai bol deta hu ehehehe. 

Mumbai me maze krenge Priyal. Daaru bhi. Aur AmEx ki bitching bhi ğŸ’¥ğŸ’¥ till then tc!
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Kya cool bio Shibalikk! Hall 1 canteen me mujhe first time pata chala tha ki tu physics me kaafi interested hai aur bakchod bhi. Kabhi bhi kisi Musicals Manager ki wajah se baaki Managers me itna khauf nhi aaya hoga â¤ï¸. Terse Head ke liye baat krna mere khud ke liye itna dilemmatic ho gya tha bacause I knew your academic interests. But as tune Head banke chaapa ya infact jitna tune Head banke chaapa, I have immense confidence tu usse zada hi research me machayega. I hope teri jitni proactivity kabhi match kr pau, you stay so fucking awesome bro. ğŸ”¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Come back home alreadyy. Patience sikhaya Teacher ne, test lena zaruri kya? :/
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text:
Okay. Less go!! First and foremost congratulations. Finally CL trophy ke itna kareeb aa gye hain aap. Football ka abhi jo phase chal rha hai na Khare bro, jitna dil football khush krti hai utna hi tum dono ki company. Maze double! Phir vo raat ka philosophy ka discussion. Made Goel uncomfortable thoda to ğŸ˜‚, but Swampman reh gya yaar. He's soon to be FUCKED. Techkriti me tere kaam ke liye terko BIG PROUD HUGS. Big fan of dedication, big fan of you! Daaru peeke jo tere exotic gaano ki demand aati hai, wonderful wonderful stuff ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡. WC '18 sath me dekha tha. Sath me bahar hue yaar, tu hi BT samajh skta hai. Still you penned a beautiful letter from the depths of your heart, I can NOT yearn for more. Yes, it takes courage 2 wing ko sath me GPL dena. You certainly have loads. You'll always be the Sr. Photographer. Chhotu ka level badh hi nhi rha hai. You asked to caption a few of your clicks. I mean can there be a greater sense of faith, trust? But the best memory, when us din us library mein Einstein got embarassed at the hands of 3 freshmen. When we arrived on this conclusion and declared to the children of science, this bitch time is a fucking wave!

Qatar on hai broo. GOATS on football's biggest platform for one last time. Too good to be missed. I'll kill you ditch kiya to!

Love you. Blessed to. â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Bhai Sharma last me kaafi mil liye sahi hai. First time to dhang se vo discussion me hi baithe the. Maza aaya bhai, bold stance rkhta hai tu, badhiya rha tha. Ek aur bacha hai. Nipta denge vo bhi ek din. Aur aur kai bhi. IIM ke liye phir se badhaiyaan, macha diyo vaha pe bhi bro ğŸ’¥ğŸ’¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Abe vo rupani wala ma chuda rha hai. Abe chal uske Lucknow wale store chalte hain. Phir us electronics wale ki bhi bajana hai. Bhai 50 le aaye pehli trip me. Bhaiiii. Saale kitne emotions share kiye hn tere sath. Madarchod badhwe '20 me kyu nhi aaya sath tu. Bolta rha terko last tak. Bhaiya aaye nhi par. '19 me kaam kiya bro tere sath. Kya maze kiye be sath me itne C bot me. Tere color run me stage pe aake dance krne me feel aa gyi. Aur Shankar ki nite, barricading ke aage? Brooooo â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Bhavesh broo, Bc intern ke time itni baar ma chudai maine portal pe account ke saath, har baar tune sambhala hai. Placement me to sort of teri existence se hi thoda confidence tha ki ho jayega kuch na kuch, dekh lenge. OP OPC to tu hai, par vo prank yaad hai tujhe first year wala jab E6 side aaya tha tu paani bharne? ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ uske liye sort of mujhe bura lag rha tha us time ki zada ho gya, but in retrospect I guess as everything, chill hai ğŸ˜‚ Mumbai me milte hain, pel denge ğŸ»ğŸ»ğŸ’¥ğŸ’¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Chal trip pe chalte hain ğŸ¤ª
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text:
Ab tu dikh to nhi rha saamne physically, but tere baare me sochke bhi din bana jaata hai ğŸ˜‚. Starting me yaad hai Yadu ki udaate the sath me, par best tera co-manager tha by far. Kya crazzyyy kisse, raushan ki call record krke sikhaya easily ja skta hai ki baccho dekho ye ye nhi krna hai ğŸ˜†. Maulik Khanna terpe jab bhi fata hai, I felt you bro ğŸ˜¥. Core Team me aa jata tu na saale, kya hi jalwe ho jaate bhaii. Galaxy '18 ka group dance nhi bhul skta mai kabhi bhi. Hero waali vibes aayi thi tujhse, Hero hi tha tu. Vaise steps sikhana bakchod bakchod, terse hi sikhunga direct ğŸ˜› khi aur ko divert nhi krega tu ye farz ğŸ™ƒ

â¤ï¸ğŸ”¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: I am baffled I had no idea I was co-heading a monster back then when we were asserted as bohot hee zada strong ho gye hain ye to, fuckk. Phir apni baari ki last last ki op jugalbandi, Yadu Sharma ko beech me aana pada hai 2-3 baar. Tere mere space-time me Lavender Washroom ka coordinate shared hai. Looking into that mirror, I could think of a plot, but demand dotting more coordinates in common. Listening to Lamar these days. The mind sometimes goes over to that thought of really we're not slapping someone coz vo wapas aa skta hai; but I rarely go over, in a flash deploy one of your tools. Why kill it, just save it for another day..
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Mai against me hu bro us triad pe!
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: It started with the synchro '19 tshirt. I had only heard about you. Doing drugs is an experience, and so is meeting you dear in person, I will affirm. It's deep pleasure and great delight I could see you effortlessly manifest curves in your art. We talked on chat and I got to know a little more about design, I hope I know a little more about you too soon. Lots of love, you stay innocent! ğŸ’š
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text:
Careful Jay. It's Ms Flamme here. 

Jab starting me aaya tha to itni entropy expect nhi ki tha. Silly me? Haan partly. College me aa rhe ho, how do you expect everything to go so nice n cheese, but spare me thoda sa, mai itna bhi guilty nhi because aane ke 2-3 din me hee ek ladki se milna hua. Vo mere bagal me hi baithi thi, sab theek tha, itne me hi vo achanak meri taraf mudi, aur ek shabd boli. Ek, sirf ek. Samajh to nhi paya mai us samay kya hua, kya ho gya. Samajh to aaj bhi nhi paya hu par us shabd ki uttejna usi pal se alag ho gyi zindagi bhar ke liye. Usne kajal lagaya tha, badi hi pyaari lag rhi thi vo.

Tujhe yaad hoga ki humne numbers exchange nhi kiye the bade time tak. Mudreka ke thru milte the, hawa ki philosophy discuss krte the. God ki existence ko brutally destroy aur defend kiya. Self ki depths ko, heights ko, beliefs ko, connects ko, sab kuch test hua, sab kuch test kiya. Discussions bohot hue. Aur in sab ke beech pata chala tu jitni thoughts me rebel hai, utni hi life me bhi.

Tu ye jaanti hogi Gunjan ki walks pe bohot saari mast crazy baate ki, par tu ye nhi jaanti hogi ki in walks ke pehle mai padh ke aata tha, prepare krke aata tha. Tujhe ye realisation hoga Gunjan ki teri company special to thi, par tu ye nhi jaanti hogi ki isse pehle kabhi itna tense nhi hua. Tu shayad is chij se bhi aware hogi Gunjan ki tere liye vo poem ek din me likhi thi, par tu ye nhi jaanti hogi ki us din ke baad mai aajtak koi poem complete nhi kar paya. Bohot attempts liye, abhi bhi ek pe kaam kr rha par yet koi complete nhi kr paya. 

2nd year me aaye, milna kam ho gya. Jaha hafte me roz milte the aur 2-3 baar ghumne chale jaate the, vaha ab dikhna bhi naseeb me nhi hua. Tu padhai me dhyan laga rhi thi, mai pata nhi kya kr rha tha. Time tha, time kam nhi pada par ye bhi sach hai ki hum nhi mile itna jitna pehle milte the.

Nhi socha tha ye gap badhta hi chala jayega. Beech beech me sparks the. Diro bungalow ke bahar us raat ki light setting imprinted hai man me, rhegi aur anant tak. Vo chaurahe ke aage road kinare mandir se emanating green light yaad hai? Tune hath pakad ke aur dara diya tha. Baate jab bhi hui tere sath, acchi hui. It's hard to find koi aur un baato ke liye. Kam hone lagi, par vo elements the. Vo glory thi. Shayad apne apne raaste pakad liye. Antaragni ho gyi, mere bahane khatam. Ek din room pe aya tere. Us din samajh aayi. Baat kr rhe the, teri aankhein nam ho gyi. Mujhe maaf krna Gunjan. I learnt life me kuch us din. Won't go down that fucking lane ever again. 

Mai kabhi concede nhi krna chahta, na krunga ki tu cute hai. Par ab samajh gya hu. Pehle mai delusional tha, ab denial me hu. Tu hai cute, aur nhi bhi. 

If there's a bond I care and value about so much in my life, it's with you. Abhi bhi waaqif nhi ise kya kehte hain, but the day it comes to it, I'll put up a good fight, take note of that! Hey, aisa ho skta hai ki kinhi moments me dikhe nahi, but stay there na, call me up, and ask me blunt up front. I'll take responsibility of rest. 

Listening to T wala song. You're the one, suit, for it. Ms Flamme, ğŸ’š
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text:
Oye Harsh
This is no secret ki tu ultimate chaapu hai. Padhai ki baate nhi krni yaha xD, bas tu bohot relatable hai bro. I can identify bohot easily in you ki tu kitna hard-working hai. It takes courage. Stay that way! Forever. Aur uske sath humble, helpful aur mast bhi. Korea se bohot saare gift leke aana please ğŸ˜ğŸ˜˜
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text:
Palak Madam, mail me cc kr do! Mail me cc bhale hi starting me miss ho gye ho, but you never shied away from responsibility. Last me sath aake sambhala, awesome lineup prepare kiya aur chaapa bc. Antaragni bakchod hona bound tha, because Team jo bakchod thi aur kyuki Team me tujh jaise strong characters the. 3rd year me Goel ko sath galiyane me maza aya tha ehehehe. Aur case interview yaad aa rha mujhe tere sath practice kiya tha. Us din jo haal kiya tha tune mera as interviewer aur feedback me, nhi bhulunga mai kabhi bhi ğŸ˜‚. 

So glad ki nasho ke bhi swaad aa gye tujhe last me, badhiya capacity hai teri ğŸ”¥. Goa me milte hain, bohot bakchodi baaki hai abhi ğŸ˜‰
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: The thing I hate most about FCB is not their football but that deo you have ğŸ™‚
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text:
Daaassss! 
Jab first mile the to tu mujhe chaapu samajhta tha, certainly disappointed you sorry ğŸ˜…. But I'll tell reverse ka. I'm for little things and tere notes padhke, which btw helped wing me itne logo ko pass hone me, going by those notes one could tell the sheer clarity and articulate thoughts that the hand beneath possessed. It's not easy I can tell. You really must be clear in your head. I'm inclined to give an alternate proof for the same. This may not be empirically verified but people having a knack for Mathematics DO possess great organisational skills, be it in head our outside. Second year me saath rhe. Although outsiders believe otherwise and it's really funny, but I thought and I think you thought too, we both are more into that kind of setting. That did suit us well. I really appreciate the space-time you gave. I hope I'm not wrong on this ğŸ˜…. You crack poor jokes right, but part of it tracks to your innocence which is adorable. So 10 on 10. What a guy! I should not go to other qualities: acads, arts, cinema, culture, I have limited vocab and there's too much to appreciate ğŸ˜‚

PS: tera bio padhke mujhe regret ho rha AC nhi lagva paya succession me. But trust me, quotations laake mail kiye with reminders too. Authority active hi nhi hui..

And, mai sach me Liverpool fan hu ğŸ˜. Thank you so much for that amazing poster you made, means a lot!! â¤ï¸
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Kya kehne Ritik bro tumhare to, tumhare dedication ke kisse pure tenure bhar Devanshu ko sunaye. But Ritik jaisa koi aur kaha, irreplaceable hai tu. ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: I am very sure isse bohot zada talented hai tu but vo platform jitna smoothly tune aur Yadu ne sambhala hai, OP Virtual Show M! Thode occasional nashe start kr skta hai aur insta acc to bc bana hi le! ğŸ”¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Junoon ke poster design ki kaafi BT di hai tujhe, but kar/karva deta tha tu. Us time to poster me hi jaan atki hoti thi bhai. Shukriya dost, Antaragni me mile apan, isse zaada khaas aur kya ho skta hai?! ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma

text: Aye yo Yash! I would start with the thing jo I so desperately want ki sabse starting me ho jati apne sath. God ek baar Bagad ki class me agal bagal baith jaate. The lessons would have hit home alag mauj me. I think as secies, I riddled you and shreyash once on Alice ki problem ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. OP coordies then ğŸ’ªğŸ’ª, seemingly easy job ko nasty to kr diya tha apan ne baccho ke liye. Podcast kya success thi bhai, aaj hi wapas sun rha mai bc. Vo weird questionnaire, ghar aate aate itni dhyan se room ki safai ki thi coz vo file mil nhi rhi thi. I got it but and certainly I have some fun time ahead ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜‚. But also, I should vocalise this thing if I haven't till now. You must be, ditch, you ARE original stuff, I could throw in that questionnaire to you too easily. And one more thing, I'm not so sure why everyone calls you GOD. I have an idea but it's a treat I don't wanna miss. I'll catch you soon on it.
author: Jai Ranjan Sharma
